name: Custom Payment Gateway Icons
author: Nastin Mfena

sections.description: Add or change the default payment gateway icons that appear on the WooCommerce checkout page to anything you like or brand that suits your business.You can sizes for desktop and mobile view.
sections.installation:
1. Download and Upload Payment_Gateway_Icon_For_WooCommerce folder to the/wp-content/plugins/` directory.
  2. You may also search in WordPress dashbaord directly and install.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. Go to WooCommerce → Settings → Payments → select the payment gateway you want change its icon → below the settings of every payment method, you’ll see additonal settings added below by this plugin. Enter an image URL to the Icon field.
  5. There is provison for two sizes, mobile and desktop. Format your icons to your desired size before uplaoding as plugin does not utter size.
